translation:
The language change will take effect after restarting
The app will now close

id: ビューワーの使い方メッセージ
translation:
・Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out.
・Hold down the mouse wheel and move to change the camera position.
・Hold down the right mouse button and move to change the camera angle.
・Hold Shift while using the mouse to increase movement sensitivity.
・Hold Ctrl while using the mouse to decrease movement sensitivity.
・Press '0' on the keypad to set the camera view to the bottom.
・Press '2' on the keypad to set the camera view to the front.
・Press '4' on the keypad to set the camera view to the left.
・Press '5' on the keypad to set the camera view to the top.
・Press '6' on the keypad to set the camera view to the right.
・Press '8' on the keypad to set the camera view to the back.
・Use the right or up arrow keys on the keyboard to move forward a frame.
・Use the left or down arrow keys on the keyboard to move back a frame.

id: 再生フォームの使い方
translation: How to use the playback form

id: 再生ウィジェットの使い方メッセージ
translation:
・The 'Play' button becomes clickable when a PMX model is set
・Setting a VMD motion is optional
・Clicking the 'Play' button starts the rendering. The button label changes to 'Pause'
・Clicking the 'Pause' button pauses the rendering. The button label changes to 'Play'
・While paused, you can change the keyframe position with the keyframe number field or slider
・The keyframe number field and slider can adjust the number up and down with the middle mouse wheel
How to use the main screen

id: メイン画面の使い方メッセージ
translation: ・Clicking above the name of each form part outputs how to use that part in the message field

id: 予期せぬエラーヘッダー
translation:
The app will close due to an unexpected error.
Please contact the community if this happens again.
Copy the error and report it in the community

translation: Since the model name ({{.Name}}) contains characters that are unreadable in Japanese or English (environment-dependent characters, foreign language characters, etc.), a temporary model name will be set.

id: ボーン名エンコードエラー
translation: Since the bone name ({{.Name}}) contains characters that are unreadable in Japanese or English (environment-dependent characters, foreign language characters, etc.), it will be skipped.
